Description: None

Description: The Kollur plant is not in operation since March 2016, and the transaction will not have an impact on the financials of the company, it said.

Title: NDA's 2nd term will resolve NBFCs' liquidity woes: Nirmal Jain
Description: The crisis in the NBFC sector started with a series of defaults by IL&FS, which owes over Rs 99,350 crore to banks, from last September.

Description: Puri was appointed as chief executive officer (CEO) in 2017, and as Managing Director in 2018. He also heads ITC's corporate management committee.
